name: Unity Solar System Project (raging-loon)
description:
This is the first project for the Coursera course "Game Design and Development in Unity."

I added collision detection for the Projectile script, the "Planets" tag to each of the planets, and Rigidbodies to the comet prefab and the planets. This way, whenever a comet collides with a planet, it is destroyed.
